description:
Explore watsonx.data: an open, hybrid and governed data store → https://ibm.biz/BdmCUX

Apache Hadoop is an open-source framework for distributed data processing and storage. In this video Martin Keen breaks down use cases and the ecosystem that makes Apache Hadoop a powerful resource in data and analytics infrastructures.

AI news moves fast. Sign up for a monthly newsletter for AI updates from IBM → https://ibm.biz/BdmCUH
title: What is Apache Hadoop?
